verses.verse: And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite<s%>, who was of the <S%H8453>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H256>Ahab<s%>, As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> whom I <S%H5975>stand<s%>, there shall not be <S%H2919>dew<s%> nor <S%H4306>rain<s%> these <S%H8141>years<s%>, but <S%H6310>according<s%> to my <S%H1697>word<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>him<s%>, saying,

<S%H3212>Get<s%> you <S%H6437>here<s%>, and turn you <S%H6924>eastward<s%>, and <S%H5641>hide<s%> yourself by the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3747>Cherith<s%>, that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.
And it shall <S%H8354>be<s%>, that you shall drink of the <S%H5158>brook<s%>; and I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> to feed you <S%H3557>there<s%>.

So he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according unto the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: for he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> by the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3747>Cherith<s%>, that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

And the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening<s%>; and he <S%H8354>drank<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H7093>after<s%> a <S%H3117>while<s%>, that the <S%H5158>brook<s%> dried <S%H3001>up<s%>, because there had been no <S%H1653>rain<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>him<s%>, saying,

<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, <S%H3212>get<s%> you to <S%H6886>Zarephath<s%>, which belongs to <S%H6721>Zidon<s%>, and <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H6680>there<s%>: behold, I have commanded a <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> there to sustain <S%H3557>you<s%>.

So he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6886>Zarephath<s%>. And when he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H6607>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, <S%H490>behold<s%>, the widow <S%H802>woman<s%> was there <S%H7197>gathering<s%> of <S%H6086>sticks<s%>: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H559>her<s%>, and said, <S%H3947>Fetch<s%> <S%H4592>me<s%>, I pray you, a little <S%H4325>water<s%> in a <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, that I may <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

And as she was <S%H3212>going<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> <S%H7121>it<s%>, he called to <S%H559>her<s%>, and said, <S%H3947>Bring<s%> <S%H6595>me<s%>, I pray you, a morsel of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, As the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%>, I <S%H3426>have<s%> not a <S%H4580>cake<s%>, but an <S%H4393>handful<s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%> in a <S%H3537>barrel<s%>, and a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> in a <S%H6835>jar<s%>: <S%H7197>and<s%>, behold, I am gathering <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6086>sticks<s%>, that I may go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H6213>dress<s%> it for me and my <S%H1121>son<s%>, that we may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4191>it<s%>, and die.

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3372>her<s%>, Fear <S%H935>not<s%>; go and <S%H6213>do<s%> as you have <S%H1697>said<s%>: but <S%H6213>make<s%> me <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5692>cake<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%>, and <S%H3318>bring<s%> it unto <S%H314>me<s%>, and after <S%H6213>make<s%> for you and for your <S%H1121>son<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, The <S%H3537>barrel<s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%> shall not <S%H3615>waste<s%>, neither shall the <S%H6835>jar<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2637>fail<s%>, until the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>sends<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> <S%H6440>upon<s%> the <S%H127>earth<s%>.
And she <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah<s%>: and <S%H1004>she<s%>, and he, and her house, did <S%H398>eat<s%> many <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And the <S%H3537>barrel<s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%> <S%H3615>wasted<s%> <S%H6835>not<s%>, neither did the jar of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2638>fail<s%>, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H452>Elijah<s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, that the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H802>woman<s%>, the <S%H1172>mistress<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, fell <S%H2470>sick<s%>; and his <S%H2483>sickness<s%> was <S%H3966>so<s%> <S%H2389>severe<s%>, that there was no <S%H5397>breath<s%> left in <S%H3498>him<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H452>Elijah<s%>, What have I to do with <S%H376>you<s%>, O you man of <S%H430>God<s%>? are you <S%H935>come<s%> unto me to <S%H2142>call<s%> my <S%H5771>sin<s%> to <S%H2142>memory<s%>, and to <S%H4191>kill<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5414>her<s%>, Give me your <S%H1121>son<s%>. And he <S%H3947>took<s%> him out of her <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, and carried him <S%H5927>up<s%> into a <S%H5944>loft<s%>, where he <S%H3427>lived<s%>, and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him upon his own <S%H4296>bed<s%>.

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, have you also brought <S%H7489>evil<s%> upon the <S%H490>widow<s%> with whom I <S%H1481>live<s%>, by <S%H4191>slaying<s%> her <S%H1121>son<s%>?

And he <S%H4058>stretched<s%> himself upon the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%>, and <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, I pray <S%H3206>you<s%>, let this child's <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7725>come<s%> into <S%H7130>him<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah<s%>; and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H7725>came<s%> into <S%H7130>him<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>, and he <S%H2421>revived<s%>.

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%>, and brought him <S%H3381>down<s%> out of the <S%H5944>chamber<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him unto his <S%H517>mother<s%>: and <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%>, your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah<s%>, Now by <S%H2088>this<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H571>truth<s%>.
